sidebar.title: Let's discover the workspace toolbar together !
sidebar.general: The toolbar will allow you to navigate inside the current workspace.
sidebar.tools-group: The tools group permits to open the different enabled tools.
sidebar.actions-group: The actions group permits to manage and show information about the workspace.
sidebar.opened-tool: This is the currently opened tool.

tools.analytics: Shows some analytics data of the workspace usage.
tools.home: Permits to create an overview of the workspace.
tools.logs: Shows the actions done by users in the workspace.
tools.resource_manager: Permits to view and manage the resources of the workspace.
tools.users: Permits to view the registered users and groups, changes their rights and register new ones.

actions.about: Shows general information about the workspace.
actions.delete: Permits to delete the workspace and all of its contents.
actions.impersonation: Permits to navigate inside the workspace with another role to see what those users see.
